title: The Herd-HOUR-3-Los Angeles Lakers and Mario Elie
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR-3-Los Angeles Lakers and Mario Elie
description:
John finishes up the show with what makes a team special, and former Houston Rocket Mario Elie joins to talk NBA Playoffs, the role you fill on your team and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
